definitions.title: n.pr.dei,
definitions.body: in Aram. (O Aram. [[רמן]] in n.pr. Lzb:369 Cook 108; As. Rammânu, god of wind, rain and storm (Schr:COT 2Ki 5:18 Zim:KAT 3, 442 ff. Muss-Arnolt:JBL xi (1892), 172 Jastr:Rei. Bab. 156 ff.); Sab. [[רמן]] (CIS:iv, no.140, 209 H. Derenb in Kohut-Studies:120 ff.); etym. dub.; √[[רעם]] thunder Schr; √ramâmu, roar D1:HWB 624 and most; = 1. [[רִמּוֹן]] Hom:A. u. A. 98);—´[[בֵּית ר]]: 2Ki 5:18, [[בֵּית רִמּׂן]] v:2Ki 5:18, v:2Ki 5:18; Remman[q];—v. also [[הֲדַדְרִמּוֹן]] p. 213, [[טַבְרִמּוֹן]] p. 372.
